title: Project Mapped Smart Home
detail: Augmented reality by mapping attention to physical space
extended_details:
PARTS LIST:
https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/11VZUGWIBDNQ7?ref_=wl_share

Using projecting mapping, give the user information about their home, integrated seamlessly in the home. Using cameras and thermal imaging, data will be taken over time on things like temperature, gas usage, and water usage, and presented through Processing and projection mapping.
